start.speaker: rowena
start.text: No coffee? This can't be happening...

node2.speaker: doctor
node2.text: Ah! Rowena Pitifool! What keeps you going? Your cherished coffee, the faithful companion in your... dry spells. Oh, the trials your... profession must face!

node3.speaker: rowena
node3.text: Doc, you are my nightmare. You know I can't wake up without it.

node4.speaker: rowena
node4.text: Just like you, this is a disaster, Doc. You know I need my coffee.

node5.speaker: rowena
node5.text: Doc, my nemesis. Can't you be helpful for once?

node6.speaker: doctor
node6.text: Yes, your vital elixir. Always there to fill that void in your... muff.

node7.speaker: doctor
node7.text: Yes, your vital elixir. Always there to fill that void in your... hoo-ha.

node8.speaker: doctor
node8.text: Helpful? My dear, I'm the voice of reason in your chaotic life. How about finding a solution for your coffee dilemma?
